tool_description: Tracks the delivery status of sent messages across different communication channels and provides detailed delivery information.

message_id.description: Unique identifier of the message to track

include_events.description: Whether to include detailed delivery event history

timeout_seconds.description: Maximum time to wait for delivery status (1-300 seconds)

error_messages: Message not found: The provided message_id does not exist in tracking system.
Invalid channel: Channel must be one of [email, sms, push].
Timeout exceeded: Tracking timeout must be between 1 and 300 seconds.
Tracking service unavailable: Message tracking service is temporarily unavailable.
usage: Provide message_id and channel to track delivery status. Set include_events for detailed tracking history and adjust timeout_seconds as needed.

delivery_status.description: Current delivery status (pending, delivered, failed, bounced)

events.description: Chronological list of delivery events and timestamps

failure_reason.description: Reason for delivery failure if applicable
